function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(fjm) from ecif.lcIB_XSB_LXSMSHLC_FJ where lcIB_XSB_LXSMSHLC_ID=? and fjlx = (select id from ecif.tIB_WDLXPZ where wdlxm = '立项申请报告（简版）' and lcbd = 'lcIB_XSB_LXSMSHLC')",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
a>=1;

<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(fjm) from ecif.lcIB_XSB_LXSMSHLC_FJ where lcIB_XSB_LXSMSHLC_ID=? and fjlx = (select id from ecif.tIB_WDLXPZ where wdlxm = '协同统计表' and lcbd = 'lcIB_XSB_LXSMSHLC')",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
a>=1;
'附件信息中的立项申请报告（简版）未上传，请检查！'
'附件信息中的协同统计表未上传，请检查！'
'在底稿系统中完成“项目承揽及立项阶段”底稿上传工作，才能发起立项流程'

step.name: 业务部门质控专员审批

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
cnt==1&& O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.SFWCXC == 3

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
cnt==1 && O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.SFWCXC != 3

step.name: 投资银行总部文管审批
投资银行总部职能审批
投资银行总部总经理审批

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(id)),',',';') from tuser where id in (select userid from jgcrm.lbMember where roleid in (select id from jgcrm.lbRole where name like '%法律合规专员%') AND ORGID = 13833) and Status = 1\")","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-书面立项流程质控部文管已审核'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

step.name: 质控部专员（主副审）审核
业务部门质控专员审批
质控部门文管形式审核
保荐业务部门负责人审批
